testcase.classname: CSV Upload Database Integrity › Halifax CSV - Database Records
testcase.name: should have created transaction records retrievable via API

testcase.classname: CSV Upload Database Integrity › Halifax CSV - Database Records
testcase.name: should have correct upload operation status (COMPLETED)

testcase.classname: CSV Upload Database Integrity › Mettle CSV - Database Records with Calculated Balances
testcase.name: should have imported all 5 Mettle transactions

testcase.classname: CSV Upload Database Integrity › Mettle CSV - Database Records with Calculated Balances
testcase.name: should report correct counts in upload response

testcase.classname: CSV Upload Database Integrity › Upload Operation Status Transitions
testcase.name: should transition through CHECKING → VALIDITY_CHECK_PASSED

testcase.classname: CSV Upload Database Integrity › Upload Operation Status Transitions
testcase.name: should transition to VALIDITY_CHECK_FAILED for invalid CSV

testcase.classname: CSV Upload Database Integrity › Upload Operation Status Transitions
testcase.name: should not allow re-upload of already completed operation

testcase.classname: CSV Upload Database Integrity › Malformed Data Handling
testcase.name: should handle Halifax CSV with mixed valid/invalid rows

testcase.classname: CSV Upload Database Integrity › Malformed Data Handling
testcase.name: should handle Mettle CSV with malformed data rows
